root: ^The great warrior... Come and see what I've lost
^I live away from people. I don't hurt anybody.
^But look what those cursed witches did to me!
^Please, if you see Greta, let her know what happened!

g-0: ^Bon voyage, warrior! May the light of Greta be with you!
^Follow the light! You can only find Greta in the light!
